metadata.title: USN-7238-2 -- Linux kernel (Oracle) vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Several security issues were discovered in the Linux kernel. An attacker could possibly use these to compromise the system. This update corrects flaws in the following subsystems:   - Network traffic control;   - VMware vSockets driver; (CVE-2024-53103, CVE-2024-53164)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7238-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-buildinfo-6.11.0-1010-oracle - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-buildinfo-6.11.0-1010-oracle-64k - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-headers-6.11.0-1010-oracle - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-headers-6.11.0-1010-oracle-64k - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-headers-oracle - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-headers-oracle-64k - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-image-6.11.0-1010-oracle - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-image-6.11.0-1010-oracle-64k - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-image-oracle - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-image-oracle-64k - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1010-oracle - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1010-oracle-64k - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-modules-6.11.0-1010-oracle - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-modules-6.11.0-1010-oracle-64k - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-modules-extra-6.11.0-1010-oracle - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-modules-extra-6.11.0-1010-oracle-64k - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-oracle - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-oracle-64k - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-oracle-headers-6.11.0-1010 - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-oracle-tools-6.11.0-1010 - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-tools-6.11.0-1010-oracle - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-tools-6.11.0-1010-oracle-64k - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-tools-oracle - 6.11.0-1010.10 linux-tools-oracle-64k - 6.11.0-1010.10 No subscription required
